data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Boucle du Mouhoun, Burkina Faso to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Boucle du Mouhoun, Burkina Faso
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 151,793 believers in Boucle du Mouhoun, Burkina Faso a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Boucle du Mouhoun a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Boucle du Mouhoun, Burkina Faso today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Dagaari Dioula, Wala people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Dagaari Dioula, Wala people.
Lord, use Google search to lead people in Boucle du Mouhoun, Burkina Faso to the gospel today.
Spirit, defend the church in the state of Boucle du Mouhoun against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Boucle du Mouhoun, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.
